topic.title: How to Change the Admin ('fusion') Password

body.p:
To change the password of the admin user (fusion), follow these steps:
Run the following command to obtain the hashed form of the password (my-password in the following command):cd /fusion sudo docker-compose exec config-server nodejs hashpwd.js my-password
The resulting output should replace the value of the "password" field in the /fusion/default-data/config/config-server/users.json file. To edit this file, you need to use the sudo command.
